content: a beautiful little baby blanket this one works up quickly i was able to finish it in about three days i used an i hook but i think it would work even if you used a larger or smaller hook play around mix colors even try it without the flower for a little boy enjoy **do 3sc in every corner every border round ** **note this pattern has been updated please make sure you have the current copy ** **on the final single_crochet rounds you must crochet three times in every corner on each round **
